title: Remove redundant semi colons
body:
There are 10 spots in the code where an extra semi-colon is used redundantly.

They were found using Roslynator
https://github.com/JosefPihrt/Roslynator/blob/master/docs/analyzers/RCS1038.md

```
Severity	Code	Description	Project	File	Line	Suppression State
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Deprecated\Engine\Engine\Expander.cs	1597	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Deprecated\Engine\Properties\BuildProperty.cs	636	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Deprecated\Engine\Properties\BuildPropertyGroup.cs	1280	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Tasks (net472)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Tasks\ManifestUtil\ApplicationManifest.cs	417	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Tasks (net472)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Tasks\ManifestUtil\TrustInfo.cs	235	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.CommandLine.UnitTests (net472), Microsoft.Build.CommandLine.UnitTests (netcoreapp2.1)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\MSBuild.UnitTests\XMake_Tests.cs	1906	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (net472), Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (netcoreapp2.1)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Build.OM.UnitTests\Definition\ProjectItem_Tests.cs	2083	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (net472), Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (netcoreapp2.1)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Build.OM.UnitTests\Definition\ProjectItem_Tests.cs	2096	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (net472), Microsoft.Build.Engine.OM.UnitTests (netcoreapp2.1)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Build.OM.UnitTests\ObjectModelRemoting\LinkedProjectCollection_Tests.cs	37	Active
Message	RCS1038	Remove empty statement.	Microsoft.Build.Engine.UnitTests (net472), Microsoft.Build.Engine.UnitTests (netcoreapp2.1)	D:\Development\msbuild\src\Build.UnitTests\BackEnd\LoggingServicesLogMethod_Tests.cs	1131	Active
```
